24/7 Sanitization
COVID-19 is spread by a virus that can fall on a variety of surfaces. When people touch certain surfaces and subsequently touch their nose, mouth, or eyes, they risk being contaminated. In most cases, touching a surface has a modest risk of infection. Hand washing with soap and water or using an alcohol-based hand sanitizer is the most effective technique to avoid infection from surfaces. Infection can also be reduced by sanitising and cleaning surfaces.
Social Distancing
The current advice for reducing COVID-19 transmission is a 6-foot space between individuals. This is a cautious technique that takes into account situations where people are standing along a wall or not in the middle of the circle.
